headline.main: Trump Inherits a Secret Cyberwar Against North Korean Missiles
headline.print_headline: Trump Inherits Secret Cyberwar on North Korea

lead_paragraph: Northern Ireland's snap election has left the rival extremes of politics virtually neck and neck for the first time — and facing a bruising battle to put their Catholic-Protestant government back together again in an increasingly polarized landscape.
